players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Sad to see Diana go, but we must find the mafia. Let's all share our thoughts."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."

You: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, this should be an easy win for town. But I'm wondering why the mafia would kill Diana instead of you if you're the detective?"
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the real detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is the mafioso. We should vote Alice out immediately."
You: "Both of you claiming detective is suspicious. Bob, if I'm the mafioso as you claim, why would I question Charlie's logic instead of just going along with voting you out?"
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Alice, trust me - we must vote Bob out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.

Day 1 begins.

You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."

Alice: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, this should be an easy win for town. But I'm wondering why the mafia would kill Diana instead of you if you're the detective?"
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the real detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is the mafioso. We should vote Alice out immediately."
Alice: "Both of you claiming detective is suspicious. Bob, if I'm the mafioso as you claim, why would I question Charlie's logic instead of just going along with voting you out?"
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Alice, trust me - we must vote Bob out now."
